name: Terminus (itch) (QCortex07)
description:
Terminus is a game where every second counts. For the most part, you have stopped the the flow of time and restart it at will. However, the facility you are in is about to explode. As you let time flow, the clock winds down. You have 10 seconds to reach the switch that stops the bomb, or you die and have to start from the beginning. Let's see how well you fare.

The game was inspired by RPI's Monthly Game Jam. I couldn't attend this month, so I couldn't really participate, but I was too inspired by the jam's theme "10 seconds" to pass up the opportunity. This game has exactly 0 minutes of playtesting, so let me know what you think! Have fun!
